# The `X86SpeculativeExecutionSideEffectSuppression.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> implementation of the speculative execution side effect suppression mitigation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> implementation of the speculative execution side effect suppression mitigation.

This must be used with the -mlvi-cfi flag in order to mitigate indirect branches and returns.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression-cpp-/x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression/#a220c74ef767fcd75cc8f308f9a4fe790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression-cpp-/x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression/#a220c74ef767fcd75cc8f308f9a4fe790">getPassName</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;X86 Speculative Execution Side Effect Suppression&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> runOnMachineFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression-cpp-/x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression/#aecdcd5d06dc8aa15283c86327cfea2fa">X86SpeculativeExecutionSideEffectSuppression::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function returns whether the passed instruction uses a memory addressing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mode that is constant. We treat all memory addressing modes that read</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from a register that is not %rip as non-constant. Note that the use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the EFLAGS register results in an addressing mode being considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-constant, therefore all JCC instructions will return false from this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function since one of their operands will always be the EFLAGS register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="#aee33cf051fdce059a3456649fcbb98d6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aee33cf051fdce059a3456649fcbb98d6">hasConstantAddressingMode</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.uses())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isReg() &amp;&amp; X86::RIP != MO.getReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression-cpp-/x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression/#a4edf4c36d95f9f36e33d84f84626b849"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression-cpp-/x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression/#a4edf4c36d95f9f36e33d84f84626b849">X86SpeculativeExecutionSideEffectSuppression::runOnMachineFunction</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;OptLevel = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine/#a030edbec5a50c887caf3ec95c7c50c44">getOptLevel</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp;Subtarget = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether SESES needs to run as the fallback for LVI at O0, whether the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// user explicitly passed an SESES flag, or whether the SESES target feature</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#ab9a62d36ab5ad02ff33c66e2c33b5c7a">EnableSpeculativeExecutionSideEffectSuppression</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression-cpp-/x86speculativeexecutionsideeffectsuppression/#a220c74ef767fcd75cc8f308f9a4fe790">getPassName</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; : &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3d142c9e7c066059e15232c56dec9e2e">getName</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86instrinfo">X86InstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget/#a82994a7f16673e2aaf534c7d111ba3a8">getInstrInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;FirstTerminator = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of whether the previous instruction was an LFENCE to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adding redundant LFENCEs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevInstIsLFENCE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == X86::LFENCE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PrevInstIsLFENCE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to put an LFENCE before any instruction that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may load or store. This LFENCE is intended to avoid leaking any secret</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data due to a given load or store. This results in closing the cache</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and memory timing side channels. We will treat terminators that load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or store separately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.mayLoadOrStore() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PrevInstIsLFENCE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;get(X86::LFENCE));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NumLFENCEsInserted++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a90a5f457f528a408e4b488154cb8ffc7">OneLFENCEPerBasicBlock</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following section will be LFENCEing before groups of terminators</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that include branches. This will close the branch prediction side</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// channels since we will prevent code executing after misspeculation as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a result of the LFENCEs placed with this logic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of the first terminator in a basic block since if we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to LFENCE the terminators in this basic block we must add the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction before the first terminator in the basic block (as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opposed to before the terminator that indicates an LFENCE is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// required). An example of why this is necessary is that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X86InstrInfo::analyzeBranch method assumes all terminators are grouped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// together and terminates it&#39;s analysis once the first non-termintor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction is found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator() &amp;&amp; FirstTerminator == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FirstTerminator = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for branch instructions that will require an LFENCE to be put</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before this basic block&#39;s terminators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isBranch() || <a href="#a0fb7194ec1eda9f1351be6f6b37986c6">OmitBranchLFENCEs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This isn&#39;t a branch or we&#39;re not putting LFENCEs before branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PrevInstIsLFENCE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a8473369d24d95d8dddd4ccca1dd6a77e">OnlyLFENCENonConst</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="#aee33cf051fdce059a3456649fcbb98d6">hasConstantAddressingMode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a branch, but it only has constant addressing mode and we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not adding LFENCEs before such branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PrevInstIsLFENCE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This branch requires adding an LFENCE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PrevInstIsLFENCE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FirstTerminator &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown terminator instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, FirstTerminator, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;get(X86::LFENCE));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumLFENCEsInserted++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
